statements: DELETE FROM ConservationResearchData WHERE experiment_id = 5 AND experiment_date = '2022-08-15';
DELETE FROM ConservationResearchData WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND experiment_id = 100;
DELETE FROM ConservationResearchData WHERE experiment_location = 'Forest' AND water_usage > 50;
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE organization = 'University XYZ';
DELETE FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Experiments WHERE researcher_id = 2 AND experiment_date < '2022-01-01';
